main event: A sighting of a circular shaped light colored object occurred in Kettering, Ohio on May 1, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as a circular shape, reflective and brighter than stars., The sighting lasted between 2 to 3 minutes., It was observed moving northerly under clouds, possibly from a distance of 8 to 10 miles., The witness reported no sound coming from the object., The conclusion reached was that it was likely a balloon.
witness description: 18 years old male, located in Kettering, Ohio
